overview: The problematic of rural and peri-urban schools fumigated with pesticides in the province of Buenos Aires. A school in Virrey del Pino, La Matanza, based on the case of Erika Guebel's family. And fragments filmed in other schools in San Andrés de Giles and Luján. An audiovisual production of the Department of Education of the National University of Luján with teaching teams.
title: Escuelas fumigadas
